data.message: If you are a #True #STAN you bleed faith in #Eminem you live his music. you thrive and motivate from his music to become who you wanna be , he tought me that you can do anything you put your mind to you just gotta believe in your self and never give in to what people say,  you gotta try to succeed in life , no one looks at the world for what it used to be to what it is now , music tries to paint a picture in your mind to show you struggles in life of the the world or through the eyes of the artist or of how we can smoke weed n it wont kill us or that money is no object when you put your dreams first to live a life so you dont gotta worry or the opportunity to meet fans that believe in you n worship your music from how you lay it on the line to the speed of your rhythm to the pain deep within the words or hidden messages of what they seek n what they fear. IM A STAN ive always been a STAN cause I was born in that time frame of my home boys come up. You shouldn't hate an artist if you do when then they hate you and if they hate you every artist you listen to hates you. We are people , poets rappers singers you name it , music!  If you hate Eminem well then FUCK YOU if you hate any other music artists also FUCK YOU! STANS THERE'S A SLIM SHADY IN ALL OF US , FUCK IT LETS ALL STAND UP!

replies.message: I find him ok i like big pun n big l better tho
Nah no one could compare to Eminem !
